formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'DBdeltree' =-
[Synopsis] Delete a family or keytree from the database
[Description] DBdeltree(family[/keytree]): This application will delete a family or keytree from the Asterisk database
